name: Out of Your Mind (itch)
description:
Out of Your Mind is a little game jam game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The theme was: Out of Control,

So we went with parenting.

In this game you do some chores that a parent would do, like:

-Defending your houseplant from your cat!

-Making spaghetti!

-Feeding your baby!

-Fixing a toy car!

Its mostly just a simple high-score based Wario-Ware-like game.

I plan on making an expanded version after the jam is over. When that happens I'll link it here: (not yet!)

Credits:

BlockCabin (Code) - Youtube - Twitter

Haylo (Art) - Youtube

Cinder (Nothing but Moral "Support") - Twitter

Some (one) royalty free sounds from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
